desc: The perfect online store to buy bold statement jewelry that resonates with your confident personality. Dauntless one-a-kind designs with stunning pearls and semiprecious stones. It all starts with a single ONE design that empowers you with charm and confidence because you're a woman unafraid to be noticed.

layout.text: DAUNTLESS WOMEN DESERVE JEWELRY DESIGNED NOT FOR THE FAINT-OF-HEART
Bold pearls and statement pieces that get noticed
